author: cnbc.com
title: Intermolecular: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) _ Intermolecular Inc. (IMI) on Tuesday reported a loss of $623,000 in its first quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Jose, California-based company said it had a loss of 1 cent.
The materials research company semiconductor and clean-energy industries posted revenue of $9.7 million in the period.
For the current quarter ending in July, Intermolecular said it expects revenue in the range of $9.8 million to $10.2 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, the company's shares hit $1.18. A year ago, they were trading at 85 cents.
